overview: Music & Musicals, Latin Music, Brazilian Music - Brazilian songstress Maria Bethânia performs live in Rio de Janeiro in this 2002 concert featuring the traditional music favorites that made her famous in her home country -- just like her younger brother, Brazilian songwriter Caetano Veloso. Selections include renditions of "Explode Coração," "Amigos," "Nem Sol, Nem Lua, Nem Eu," "Menininha," "Nossa Canção," "Rosa dos Ventos" and "Amor Indio," plus an artist biography and interviews.
title: Maricotinha Ao Vivo
